Content: Hi guys, I was riding my bike on a road where the lines are painting. I had to pass on new painted lines and the paint splashed to the bike and now it is dried. How can i remove this paint without any harm (metal, plastic etc.) Please enlighten me. Regards.

Title: How to remove road line paint
